content.rendered:
we’re happy to say our beauty bars can offer these facial services to our guests:

+ brow waxing + tinting services

+ lash tinting + lifting services

we are also recommending all guests who book one of our pedi services to please bring your own flip flops/footwear to our beauty bars. thank you!
